fullplot: A King has made a pact with a dragon where he sacrfices virgins to it, and the dragon leaves his kingdom alone. An old wizard, and his keen young apprentice volunteer to kill the dragon and attempt to save the next virgin in line - the Kings own daughter.
plot: A young wizarding apprentice is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom.
title: Dragonslayer

tomatoes.consensus: An atypically dark Disney adventure, Dragonslayer puts a realistic spin -- and some impressive special effects -- on a familiar tale.
